contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appellant’s challenge to the jury voir dire procedure is controlled by our holdings in Commonwealth v. Moore, 462 Pa. 231, 340 A.2d 447 (1975), Commonwealth v. Moon, 389 Pa. 304, 132 A.2d 224 (1957), and Commonwealth v. Bibalo, 375 Pa. 257, 100 A.2d 45 (1953). Accordingly, the judgments of sentences must be affirmed.
